page.title: 14 The Community Centre.
page.content:
The Community Centre in Bushmills was built by Moyle District Council and opened in 1984. In the spring of 1985 the full time Ace worker who ran the centre left and was not replaced. This decision caused controversy in the local council and local press. A survey was carried out by Dunluce School to ascertain how far the centre was meeting the needs of the community.
1. Do you use the new Community Centre in Bushmills?
121 respondents. YES 60 NO 61
2. If yes, how often?
60 respondents
More than once a week 26
